Transaction State Context.Credit Lending State: When users lend money via lendGovernmentMoney function.
Transaction State Context.System Reset State: When system breaks down due to a lack of new credit within 12 hours.

External Interactions.Creditor Transactions: The contract transfers money between the contract and creditors during lending and payout operations.
External Interactions.Elite Transactions: Transfers 5% of funds to corruptElite during lending.
